name: Marshall University Game Jam 2018 Admin Game
name_original: Marshall University Game Jam 2018 Admin Game
description:
Marshall University's Digital Humanities Program teamed up with the Game Design Guild to make a game for Marshall's first ever GAME JAM.

While the admins had not planned to participate, they decided that if the participants can make game in less than two days, then so can they!

Two game designers and two English teachers pulled it together in a few hours.

Writing: Kristen Lillvis
Art: Matt Mundell
Programming: Timm Johnson, "sonictimm"
Also being an admin: Nathan Rucker
